remarks: Any element of a sequence multiplication only depends on the values of the argument sequences up to and including that point.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2016.)
statement:
smueq.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN0 ) $.
smueq.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ NN0 ) $.
smueq.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
smueq $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A smul B ) i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) = ( ( ( A i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) smul ( B i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) i^i ( 0 ..^ N ) ) ) $.
